## teamsfx-bot package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TeamsBotSsoPrompt](./teamsfx-bot.teamsbotssoprompt.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Creates a new prompt that leverage Teams Single Sign On (SSO) support for bot to automatically sign in user and help receive oauth token, asks the user to consent if needed. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TeamsBotSsoPromptSettings](./teamsfx-bot.teamsbotssopromptsettings.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Settings used to configure an TeamsBotSsoPrompt instance. |
|  [TeamsBotSsoPromptTokenResponse](./teamsfx-bot.teamsbotssoprompttokenresponse.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Token response provided by Teams Bot SSO prompt |
